column4: Hello guys. I`m trying to open a port via iptables with this rule: "-I INPUT -p tcp --dport 10001 -j ACCEPT". When I do iptables -L it shows me the port as open "ACCEPT tcp -- anywhere anywhere tcp dpt:10001", but when I`m trying to telnet into that port, I get "Connection refused". Can somebody please point me what I`m doing wrong? Thanks.
is there any program listenening on port 10001?
No, it is not. I was planing to use it for a OTTY server
if there's no program listening the 'connection refused' is normal
